rules_text: When Learned Journeyman enters the battlefield, create a Clue token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
rules_text2:
[i](Cast this only from your graveyard. Then exile it.)[/i]
Until end of turn, target artifact or non-Aura enchantment you control becomes a 5/5 creature.
